document.full_text: myanmar's junta made way for a new government on wednesday, ushering in an era of civilian rule dominated by the same authoritarian generals that have isolated the country for nearly two decades.
document.title: myanmar junta makes way for civilian government
lines_and_colors: myanmar's junta made way for a new government on wednesday, ushering in an era of civilian rule dominated by the same authoritarian generals that have isolated the country for nearly two decades.
